text: Jiantan is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is R15. == Station layout information == The station platforms are above ground level. Platform 1 is for Tamsui or Beitou and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan or Daan. == Around the station == * Shilin Night Market Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Jiantan metro station
